channel.title: Mill City Hall: Minneapolis politics, slightly ground down
channel.description: A Minneapolis politics podcast hosted by four-term city council member Cam Gordon and longtime activist Jesse Mortenson.
channel.itunes:author: Cam Gordon and Jesse Mortenson

item.title: Frey - Trust in Government Guy? Reviewing the State of the City Address
item.description: In May, Jacob Frey gave the official campaign speech for the city... no wait, we mean State of the City speech. Cam and Jesse share highlights from the claims he made about Minneapolis and react.
